Description.summary: Provides marker attributes to opt into source generation.
Specifies which phase disabled domain reloads cleanup should occur.

Field.name: None
Field.summary: The default value. This should never be used intentionally.

Field.name: OnExitPlayMode
Field.summary: Specifies that cleanup should be performed upon exiting play mode.

Field.name: OnEnterPlayMode
Field.summary: Specifies that cleanup should be performed upon entering play mode.
